txt.en: 'An Uruk known as Shatúrro has been hired by Thâng. Shatúrro brings a large group of hunters with him. You should help me take care of this, as I do not have the time. Make haste!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is only available while the quest, The Fushaum Resolution, is underway.</rgb>
'The hunters of Shatúrro are all gone you say? Hahaha! Thâng, you are no match for me!'
Fushaum Bal North: Shatúrro's Hired Hands
Shatúrro's hunters can be found in Fushaum Bal South.\n\nYou should defeat any hunters under the command of Shatúrro.
Khirgi can be found at Fushaum Bal North.\n\nYou should talk to Khirgi.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
